description: Ronan Hughes faces manslaughter charges over the deaths of 39 Vietnamese people found in a lorry.
title: Essex lorry deaths: Ronan Hughes extradited from Ireland to UK
title_page: Essex lorry deaths: Ronan Hughes extradited from Ireland to UK - BBC News
maintext: At the recent High Court extradition hearing in Dublin, at which the judge ordered his extradition, Mr Hughes indicated that he would not appeal and wanted to be surrendered to the UK authorities as soon as the legal formalities allowed.
